verses.translation: By the sky and the night comer
And what can make you know what is the night comer

verses.text: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
verses.translation: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector
verses.transliteration: In kullu nafsin lamma AAalayha hafithun

verses.translation: So let man observe from what he was created
He was created from a fluid, ejected
Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs
Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able
The Day when secrets will be put on trial

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ
verses.translation: Then man will have no power or any helper
verses.transliteration: Fama lahu min quwwatin wala nasirin

verses.translation: And [by] the earth which cracks open
Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement
Indeed, they are planning a plan
But I am planning a plan
So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile
